overview: Beautiful women love to wear lingerie, and beautiful lesbians love to watch each other wear it. In this beautiful, ethereal film, lesbian couples talk dirty to each other and describe what they want to do to each other's beautiful bodies while they dress (and undress) in gorgeous lingerie. Stephanie Swift reveals her breathless passion for the gorgeous blonde Puma Swede, and Heather Carolyn purrs like a kitten while describing her lust for the beautiful Diane DeLuna. Darryl Hanah can't wait to get her hands on voluptuous beauty Satine Phoenix, and Mia Presley describes in lustful detail what she plans to do to SH contract girl Elexis Monroe. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Lesbian Adventures: Lingerie Dreams
